snippet: Kerry Kennedy, a member of the famous family and herself a human-rights advocate with a global profile, copes with the attention from a very local legal tangle.
abstract: Interview with Kerry Kennedy, in which she sheds light on life as a human-rights advocate with a global profile that turned a legal stumble into a crash that landed on newspaper pages and television newscasts; Kennedy says the national news media attention over a July traffic accident baffles her because she does not consider herself a public figure.
lead_paragraph: Kerry Kennedy, a member of the famous family and herself a human-rights advocate with a global profile, copes with the attention from a very local legal tangle.

headline.seo: Kerry Kennedy Juggles Global Advocacy Work and a Local Legal Tangle
headline.main: Access and Scrutiny for a Kennedy
headline.print_headline: Access and Scrutiny Come With the Famous Last Name
